lead_paragraph: Food and exercise British food resources are strained, of course, but it is not really a correct picture of things when our own Under-Secretary of Agriculture loses more than thirteen pounds in the course of a few weeks in Great Britain.
abstract: Ed on loss of weight while in Brit
